item.title: Women Make Historic Gains in Streaming, as 36% of TV Creators Are Female
item.description: Women are making historic gains in Hollywood, accounting for 36% of creators of television programs on streaming in the 2024-2025 season. According to a report from “Boxed In” on women rep
